name: Gachinko Football: Free Kick
description:
Take free kicks at the goal in this football (soccer) game.

Feel the thrill of rocketing the ball past the "wall" and goalkeeper standing between you and the net.

Gachinko Football: Free Kick features a wide range of shots: the Spin Shot, the Drive Shot, the Straight Shot and other amazing techniques!

There are also hidden teams to face off against after you unlock them.

* Direct & Indirect Free Kicks

Gachinko Football: Free Kick lets you take direct free kicks into the net as well as indirect free kicks where your teammate passes you the ball before you shoot.

The game also features an optional setting to enable indirect free kicks.

This game is not only free to play - it's also AD FREE for improved
gameplay!
